FilterItemPortable.Name: Filtro
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">A.NOME LIKE '%' + :NOME+ '%' OR A.CODIGO LIKE '%' + :NOME+ '%'</Value> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection> <ManuallyDefinedConditionParameter> <Name>NOME</Name> </ManuallyDefinedConditionParameter> </ParameterCollection> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
